Package sample.dataAccessLayer

Class AbstractDAO<T>

java.lang.Object
sample.dataAccessLayer.AbstractDAO<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of the object from the table that is accessed
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClientDAO, OrderDAO, ProductDAO
public class AbstractDAO<T>
extends java.lang.Object
This class defines the common operations for accessing a table from a database.
Since:
22.04.2021

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    AbstractDAO()
    For each AbstractDAO object obtain the class of the generic type T

      public int insertElement​(T element)
      Method for inserting an object in a table from the database
      Parameters:
      element - an object of generic type T
      Returns:
      the id of the inserted element

    • deleteElement

      public void deleteElement​(int id, java.lang.String field)
      Method for deleting an element from a table from the database
      Parameters:
      id - an int representing the id of the element to be deleted
      field - a String representing the field based on which the element is deleted

    • updateElement

      public void updateElement​(T element)
      Method for updating the fields of an already existing object from the table in the database
      Parameters:
      element - an object of generic type T that we want to update

    • findByName

      public T findByName​(java.lang.String name)
      Method that finds an element in the table based on its name
      Parameters:
      name - a String representing the name field of the object
      Returns:
      an object of generic type T

      Method that returns all entries of a table from the database
      Returns:
      a list of object of generic type T

    • displayTable

      public void displayTable​(javafx.scene.control.TableView<T> tableView, java.util.List<T> list, javafx.collections.ObservableList<T> observableList)
      Method that receives a list of objects of type T and generates the header of the corresponding table and populates it
      Parameters:
      tableView - an object of type TableView that represents the resulting table
      list - a list of objects of generic type T that we want to introduce in the table
      observableList - the observable list of the tableView
